active.content: active → bool : Get or set whether or not this script will execute once its target frame is reached.

group.content: group → str : Get or set the group label associated with this script.

isCell.content: isCell → bool (Read Only): Returns true when the source is a cell, from a Cell.run() call.

isDAT.content: isDAT → bool (Read Only): Returns true when the source is a DAT, from a DAT.run() call.

isString.content: isString → bool (Read Only): Returns true when the source is a string, from a td module run() call

path.content: path → OP (Read Only): The operator location from which this script will execute.

remainingFrames.content: remainingFrames → int : Get or set the remaining number of frames before the execution will occur.

remainingMilliseconds.content: remainingMilliseconds → int : Get or set the remaining number of milliseconds before the execution will occur.

source.content: source → DAT | Cell | str (Read Only): The source of the run. It will be either a DAT, cell, or string.

kill.content: kill()→ None: Kill this run before it executes, and remove it from the global runs list, located in the td Module. TouchDesigner Build: Latest\nwikieditor2021.100002018.28070before 2018.28070
